languages.text:
The next hit against the target will be an automatic {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.
{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heroic act{/g}: the next hit against every enemy in combat will be an automatic critical hit.
{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Desperate measure{/g}: the next hit against every creature in combat (both allies and enemies) will be an automatic critical hit. This {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} always triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Следующее попадание в цель автоматически станет {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическим{/g}.
{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Героический акт{/g}: следующее попадание в каждого противника в бою автоматически станет критическим.
{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Отчаянные меры{/g}: следующее попадание в каждого участника боя (как союзника, так и противника) автоматически станет критическим. При использовании этой {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосилы{/g} всегда появляются {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}угрозы варпа{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
The next hit against the target will be an automatic critical hit.
Heroic act: The next attack against every enemy in combat will be an automatic critical hit.
Desperate measure: The next hit against every creature in combat (both allies and enemies) will be an automatic critical hit. This psychic power always triggers perils of the warp.

The next hit against the target will be an automatic critical hit.
Heroic act: the next hit against every enemy in combat will be an automatic critical hit.
Desperate measure: the next hit against every creature in combat (both allies and enemies) will be an automatic critical hit. This psychic power always triggers perils of the warp.

{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Desperate measure{/g}: the next hit against every creature in combat (both allies and enemies) will be an automatic critical hit. This {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} always triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.

The next hit against the target will be an automatic {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.
{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heroic act{/g}: the next hit against every enemy in combat will be an automatic critical hit.
{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Desperate measure{/g}: the next hit against every creature in combat (both allies and enemies) will be an automatic critical hit. This {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} always triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.

languages.text:
下次{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标时，必定会造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}。
{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}：下次命中新的敌人时，必定会造成暴击。此效果对战斗中的所有敌人都会生效。
{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}背水一战{/g}：下次命中新的目标时，必定会造成暴击。此效果对战斗中的所有生物都会生效，不分敌我。此{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}必定会触发来自{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}亚空间的威胁{/g}。

{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heroic act{/g}: the next hit against every enemy in combat will be an automatic critical hit.
{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Desperate measure{/g}: the next hit against every creature in combat (both allies and enemies) will be an automatic critical hit. This {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} always triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
下次{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}目标时，必定会造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}。
{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}：下次命中新的敌人时，必定会造成暴击。此效果对战斗中的所有敌人都会生效。
{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}背水一战{/g}：下次命中新的目标时，必定会造成暴击。此效果对战斗中的所有生物都会生效，不分敌我。此灵能力量必定会触发来自{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}亚空间的威胁{/g}。

languages.text:
El próximo impacto contra el objetivo será un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g} automático.
{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Acto heroico{/g}: el próximo ataque contra todos los enemigos en el combate será un impacto crítico automático.
{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Medida desesperada{/g}: el próximo impacto contra todas las criaturas en el combate (aliadas y enemigas) será un impacto crítico automático. Este {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poder psíquico{/g} siempre provoca {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}fatalidades de la disformidad{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The next hit against the target will be an automatic {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.
{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heroic act{/g}: the next hit against every enemy in combat will be an automatic critical hit.
{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Desperate measure{/g}: the next hit against every creature in combat (both allies and enemies) will be an automatic critical hit. This {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} always triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
El próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacto{/g} contra el objetivo será un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g} automático.
{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Acto heroico{/g}: el próximo ataque contra todos los enemigos en el combate será un impacto crítico automático.
{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Medida desesperada{/g}: el próximo impacto contra todas las criaturas en el combate (aliadas y enemigas) será un impacto crítico automático. Este poder psíquico siempre provoca {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}fatalidades de la disformidad{/g}.

languages.text:
ターゲットに対する次の{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}ヒット{/g}は自動的に{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}となる。
{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}：戦闘中のすべての敵に対する次のヒットは、自動的にクリティカルヒットとなる。
{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}非常手段{/g}：戦闘中の(敵味方を問わず)すべてのクリーチャーに対する次のヒットは自動的にクリティカルヒットとなる。この{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}は必ず{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}危険な<歪み>{/g}を引き起こす。

{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}非常手段{/g}：戦闘中の(敵味方を問わず)すべてのクリーチャーに対する次のヒットは自動的にクリティカルヒットとなる。この超能力は必ず{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}危険な<歪み>{/g}を引き起こす。

{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Героический акт{/g}: следующее попадание в каждого противника в бою автоматически станет критическим.

Следующее {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}попадание{/g} в цель автоматически станет {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическим{/g}.
{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Героический акт{/g}: следующее попадание в каждого противника в бою автоматически станет критическим.
{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Отчаянные меры{/g}: следующее попадание в каждого участника боя (как союзника, так и противника) автоматически станет критическим. При использовании этой психосилы всегда появляются {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}угрозы варпа{/g}.

languages.text:
Der nächste Treffer gegen das Ziel wird automatisch ein {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischer Treffer{/g}.
{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g}: Der nächste Angriff gegen einen beliebigen Feind im Kampf wird automatisch ein kritischer Treffer.
{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Verzweiflungstat{/g}: Der nächste Treffer gegen eine beliebige Kreatur im Kampf (Verbündete und Feinde) wird automatisch ein kritischer Treffer. Diese {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionische Kraft{/g} löst immer {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}Gefahren des Warp{/g} aus.
languages.original_text:
The next hit against the target will be an automatic {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.
{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heroic act{/g}: the next hit against every enemy in combat will be an automatic critical hit.
{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Desperate measure{/g}: the next hit against every creature in combat (both allies and enemies) will be an automatic critical hit. This {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} always triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Der nächste {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}Treffer{/g} gegen das Ziel wird automatisch ein {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischer Treffer{/g}.
{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g}: Der nächste Angriff gegen einen beliebigen Feind im Kampf wird automatisch ein kritischer Treffer.
{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Verzweiflungstat{/g}: Der nächste Treffer gegen eine beliebige Kreatur im Kampf (Verbündete und Feinde) wird automatisch ein kritischer Treffer. Diese psionische Kraft löst immer {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}Gefahren des Warp{/g} aus.

languages.text:
Le prochain coup infligé à la cible sera automatiquement un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g}.
{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Acte héroïque{/g} : le prochain coup infligé à chaque ennemi au combat sera automatiquement un coup critique.
{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Mesure désespérée{/g} : le prochain coup infligé à chaque créature (qu'elle soit alliée ou ennemie) au combat sera automatiquement un coup critique. Ce {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoir psychique{/g} déclenche toujours des {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}périls du Warp{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The next hit against the target will be an automatic {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.
{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heroic act{/g}: the next hit against every enemy in combat will be an automatic critical hit.
{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Desperate measure{/g}: the next hit against every creature in combat (both allies and enemies) will be an automatic critical hit. This {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} always triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Le prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}coup{/g} infligé à la cible sera un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g} automatique.
{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Acte héroïque{/g} : le prochain coup infligé à chaque ennemi au combat sera un coup critique automatique.
{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Mesure désespérée{/g} : le prochain coup infligé à chaque créature (qu'elle soit alliée ou ennemie) au combat sera un coup critique automatique. Ce pouvoir psychique déclenche toujours des {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}périls du Warp{/g}.

languages.text:
Hedefe yapılan bir sonraki vuruş, otomatik olarak {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruşa{/g} dönüşür.
{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Kahramanca eylem{/g}: Çatışmadaki herhangi bir düşmana yapılan bir sonraki vuruş, otomatik olarak kritik vuruşa dönüşür.
{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Son çare önlem{/g}: Çatışmadaki (ister dost ister düşman olsun) herhangi bir yaratığa yapılan bir sonraki vuruş, otomatik olarak kritik vuruşa dönüşür. Bu {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}ruhsezi gücü{/g} her zaman {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}öteboyut tehlikelerini{/g} tetikler.
languages.original_text:
The next hit against the target will be an automatic {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.
{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heroic act{/g}: the next hit against every enemy in combat will be an automatic critical hit.
{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Desperate measure{/g}: the next hit against every creature in combat (both allies and enemies) will be an automatic critical hit. This {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} always triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.
